text: "Callao" is a song by Peruvian singer Anna Carina released by 11y11 Records as the second single of her upcoming album.Anna Carina Copello presenta videoclip de “Callao” ==Background and release== The song was released on January 11, 2019 along with a lyric video and was written by Anna Carina along with Oscarcito, Antonio Barullo, and Dale Play who have composed for big acts such as Thalía and Jennifer Lopez.Anna Carina Copello lanzó su nuevo single “Callao” Although the song's title is the same, it's not referring to the Peruvian providence of Callao, but instead to the verb of being quiet.Moda Perú-Anna Carina-Callao The song topped the iTunes charts in Perú just a few hours after its release.Anna Carina quiere hacer bailar este verano con "Callao" ==Live Performances== Anna Carina performed the song on several television shows in order to promote it but most notably on Wantan Night which is co-hosted by her sister María Pía Copello.Wantan Night - Anna Carina y su tema "Callao" ==Music Video== The music video was released on February 28, 2019 on Anna Carina's official YouTube channel. It shows Anna Carina singing while dancing at the beach and having a beach party.The video includes cameos from several stars including Yo Soy judge Katia Palma.Anna Carina presenta nuevo videoclip de 'Callao' The video was shot in Miami and was choreographed by Anna Carina along with her sister María Pía Copello, who appeared in the video for her previous single and is a Peruvian children's television host.María Pía y Anna Carina Copello realizan divertida coreografía del tema “Callao” ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"| Perú (Monitor Latino) | 19 |- !scope="row"| Perú Pop (Monitor Latino) | 3 |- |} ==Awards and nominations== The song was nominated for Best Pop/Urban Song at the Premios Fama in 2019.Premios Fama: lista completa de ganadores de lo mejor del 2019 en tv, teatro, cine y más It was also nominated for Hit of the Year at the Premios Luces in 2019.Premios Luces 2019: revisa la lista de nominados y vota aquí por tus favoritos {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:70%;" ! scope="col" style="width:4%;"| Year ! scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Awards Ceremony ! scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Category ! scope="col" style="width:6%;"| Result |- | rowspan=2|2019 | Premios Fama | Best Pop/Urban Song | |- | Premios Luces | Hit of the Year | |} ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:Spanish-language songs Category:2019 songs Category:Anna Carina songs
title: Callao (Anna Carina song)
